Object Shape: Cigar, Circle, Cylinder, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
Summary: Multiple craft / in triangle formation / extreme speed movements at point of leaving the area
trends: There has been one other sighting in Orion Township
There were no other sightings in Orion Township on or around September 8th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile laying down on a trampoline looking directly to the sky my son and I noticed the formation of the ufos. While observing they moved in a direction several times opposite the wind direction in a clear blue sky. At the point they left during the 20 minutes of hovering and movement they took off faster than we have ever seen any jet plane and in multiple directions.
